review: the hud and weapon sounds dont quite look like the original but unlike the original this can actually run on higher framerates and more resolutions without using community fixesmods

ah the game that kicked the trilogy off  gonna cut straight to the chase download a campaign overhaul mod and avoid the awful remaster   cea is just a mishmash of reused assets from other titles as most of the covenant are just reach models poorly rigged onto the og ce models as for the visuals they ruined what made the older visuals unique there doesnt need to be bright lighting in every nook n cranny it completely negates the creepy atmospheric nature of the flood levels later on

i just finished halo infinite and i got the mcc to try the older halo games i obviously started with halo ce and oh my god i wish i had played it earlier i have missed out on so much the game is so simple yet so entertaining i will say that i dont like the updated graphics that much as in some places they ruin the vibe areas are often over lit so i recommend using the og graphics  tldr game is amazing use the og graphics and go have fun

to the people who say its repetitive im sorry you got lost in the library on easy mode this game is one of my favorite games one of the only campaigns that feels like it has balanced difficulties legendary is hard but its not impossible and doesnt have random bs like the other amazing halo games tip hit tab to switch to the original graphics
this was my first time playing the original halo and i understand now why it is such a legend among gamers absolutely brilliant gameplay cinematics guns story protagonist npcs they nailed it  1010

halo 1 is halo 1 if this game was not good there would not be so many sequels it is tons of fun in both campaign and multiplayer while the campaign has some of the most infuriating levels i have ever had the displeasure of playing there are fun cheats to aid you even in those low points of the game if you are like me and want to join the halo fan club i would recommend to start with this game it may be old but it sure as hell is gold
